attributes.action: Make schools non-school uniform/relax uniform standards to PE kits
attributes.additional_details: school uniform is expensive and pressurizing. not only are students forced to go to school (which, lets be honest, most don't want to go) but they're forced into uncomfortable, often expensive uniform which you probably wont need to wear until you're an adult. Its distracting, pointless for a good ten years, and doesn't let kids and teens express themselves. I understand the idea of school uniform, but BLAZERS, SHIRTS and TIES on kids? No thank you.
attributes.background: make school either non-school uniform or relax the uniform a lot more e.g. polo shirts and leggings/joggers

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Update school uniform guidance to prioritise comfort for students in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727890

Ban school uniforms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742463
